mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) count from pay_balance_frozen pbf inner join sys_user su on su.id=pbf.user_id
and su.id=#{merchantId} and su.type=2
and su.id=#{proxyId} and su.type=1
and pbf.frozen_type=#{frozenType}

select pbf.id id,pbf.type type,pbf.user_id userId,su.username userNo,su.`name` userName,pbf.money money,pbf.frozen_type frozenType,pbf.`status` `status`,pbf.remark remark,pbf.jd_time jdTime from pay_balance_frozen pbf inner join sys_user su on su.id=pbf.user_id where pbf.id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from pay_balance_frozen where id in (${_parameter})
